Text: john cassaday not frank quitely. lol
thank u. didn't know this existed .

you're welcome. unfortunately hardly anyone was reading it... sales had slipped to between 20 and 25 thousand, and the new 52 did help that. a year later sales were around 30 thousand. now the new 52 "bump" seems over. (sadly, march's #18 sold under 25 thousand.)
